divisions.title: Authority Revealed
divisions.summary: Jesus is baptized, calls disciples, demonstrates authority through miracles and teaching, and faces early conflicts with religious leaders

divisions.title: Power and Identity
divisions.summary: Parables of the kingdom, mighty works of power, feeding thousands, and Peter's confession that Jesus is the Christ

divisions.title: The Way of the Cross
divisions.summary: The transfiguration, teaching on servanthood and sacrifice, predictions of death, and the journey toward Jerusalem

divisions.title: Confrontation in Jerusalem
divisions.summary: Triumphal entry, temple cleansing, debates with religious leaders, and the Olivet Discourse on the last days

divisions.title: Passion and Victory
divisions.summary: The Last Supper, betrayal and arrest, trial before Pilate, crucifixion, burial, and resurrection

chapterSummaries.1: John the Baptist prepares the way; Jesus is baptized and begins his ministry
chapterSummaries.2: Jesus heals a paralytic and calls Levi; questions about fasting and the Sabbath
chapterSummaries.3: Jesus heals on the Sabbath and appoints the twelve apostles
chapterSummaries.4: The parable of the sower and other parables of the kingdom
chapterSummaries.5: Jesus casts out demons, heals a bleeding woman, and raises Jairus's daughter
chapterSummaries.6: Jesus is rejected at Nazareth, sends out the twelve, and feeds five thousand
chapterSummaries.7: Jesus teaches on what defiles and heals a Syrophoenician woman's daughter
chapterSummaries.8: Jesus feeds four thousand and Peter confesses him as the Christ
chapterSummaries.9: The transfiguration and teaching on faith, humility, and sacrifice
chapterSummaries.10: Teaching on divorce, children, wealth, and the request of James and John
chapterSummaries.11: The triumphal entry, cursing of the fig tree, and cleansing of the temple
chapterSummaries.12: Parables and debates with religious leaders; the widow's offering
chapterSummaries.13: The Olivet Discourse on the destruction of the temple and the end times
chapterSummaries.14: The Last Supper, Gethsemane, betrayal, and trial before the Sanhedrin
chapterSummaries.15: Trial before Pilate, crucifixion, death, and burial of Jesus
chapterSummaries.16: The resurrection and appearances of Jesus; the Great Commission
